data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Sand Hill Bluff, California, USA (SHB001)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Sand Hill Bluff, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using a HOBO U22 Water Temp Pro V2 (Onset Computer Corp. U22-001) beginning 2010-06-01. The instrument depth was 012 meters, in an overall water depth of 21 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
